relics.name: Apothecary Wheel
description: Damage from Disease and Bleed ticks reduced by 50% for 2 minutes

relics.name: Barrel of Filth
description: Applies a Disease effect on 3 random creatures within 3 tiles, which will inflict 6000 Damage over 20 seconds

relics.name: Beastmaster's Horn
description: Increases Damage Dealt by player's Followers by 20% for the next 2 minutes
Increases Damage Taken by player's Followers by 20% for the next 2 minutes

relics.name: Bomb Cluster
description: Will detonate after 5 seconds and inflict 5000 Damage on 5 randomized creatures within 3 tiles
Will break any Destructible Terrain or Breakable Dungeon Objects within 3 tiles

relics.name: Brace of Knives
description: Inflicts 4000 Damage to 5 random creatures within 8 tiles

relics.name: Cross of Compassion
description: For the next 2 minutes, if player Resurrects another player, the target player will resurrect with an additional 50 Hit Points
For 30 seconds after resurrection, the first time resurrected player is reduced to 0 Hit Points, they will instead be restored to 25 Hit Points

relics.name: Divination Orb
description: Each Hidden creature within 18 tiles is Revealed, becomes Hindered for 10 seconds, and player inflicts 5000 Damage on them

relics.name: Mirror of Reflection
description: Applies a 50% chance for any Spells to be reflected at their caster for 2 minutes

relics.name: Murder of Crows
description: For the next 2 minutes, the first successful Melee Attack or Spellcast on the player every 5 seconds will result in the attacker receiving 1000 Damage

relics.name: Perilous Python
description: Increases Poison Damage Dealt by player by 30% for the next 2 minutes
While effect is active, whenever player applies a new Poison effect to any creature, the player has a 10% chance to lose 10 Health (unpreventable) and be inflicted with Lethal Poison

relics.name: Prodigy Fiddle
description: For the next 2 minutes, player's Effective Barding Skill is increased by 50 and their Barding effects are immune to Barding Breaks

relics.name: Rose of Fading Beauty
description: Melee and Spell Damage Dealt by player increased by 20% for 5 minutes
Bonus to Damage Dealt is reduced by 1% every 15 seconds while effect is active

relics.name: Scale of Balance
description: The player with the lowest Hit Points within 8 tiles is healed to match the acting player's Hit Points

relics.name: Shrieking Mandrake
description: Increases Damage Dealt by player by 20% for 2 minutes
Increases Aggro generated by player by 200% for 2 minutes

relics.name: Statue of the Siren
description: Increases Damage Resistance by player by 15% for 2 minutes
Increases Aggro generated by player by 200% for 2 minutes

relics.name: The Final Hour
description: Applies a 30 second Hinder effect to the creature with the most remaining Hit Points within 8 tiles
Target cannot be Hindered by this effect more than once

relics.name: Tyromancer's Cache
description: Creates 3 Tyromancer's Cheese items in the player's backpack
Consuming a Tyromancer's Cheese will restore 20 Hit Points, 40 Stamina, and 10 Mana
Players can only consume 1 Tyromancer's Cheese every 30 seconds

relics.name: Tyromancer's Cheese
description: Consuming a Tyromancer's Cheese will restore 20 Hit Points, 40 Stamina, and 10 Mana
Players can only consume 1 Tyromancer's Cheese every 30 seconds

relics.name: Vile Concoction
description: Cures Poison and grants immunity to Poison for 2 minutes

relics.name: Warning Canary
description: The first time within the next 2 minutes that the player is reduced to 0 Hit Points, they will instead be restored to 25 Hit Points

relics.name: Widow's Grief
description: For the next 2 minutes, Increases Healing dealt by player by 33%
For the next 2 minutes, player will generate 50% less Aggro
